sentences.en: Afghanistan has not one but three economies: the aid economy, the largest one; a second illicit economy centered on drugs and smuggling; and a tiny licit economy, both formal and informal.
sentences.cn: 阿富汗不仅仅有一个而是有三个经济来源：援助经济是最主要的一个;第二个是非法经济集中在毒品和走私活动，第三个则是包括正式的和非正式的小型合法经济。

sentences.en: In 1215, the church decreed that a "licit" marriage must take place in church.
sentences.cn: 1215年，教会规定，结婚双方必须在教堂结婚才可视为“合法”婚姻。

sentences.en: Losses would then be a licit investment in future profits.
sentences.cn: 这样一来，损失就可视作为博取将来利润而进行的合法投资。

sentences.en: She made some money by licit means.
sentences.cn: 他用正当的手段挣了一些钱.

sentences.en: Tasmania - The island state is one of the world's major suppliers of licit opiate products.
sentences.cn: 塔斯马尼亚--岛屿之洲。 塔斯马尼亚洲是世界上合法鸦片剂产品的主要产地。
